Win the Deliveroo bar for your office 

We're offering you the chance to win the Deliveroo bar experience for you and your colleagues, complete with two professional bartenders. Enjoy beers, ciders, wines and cocktails from our bar-on-wheels, delivered straight to your desk.

The prize includes:

  • A fully-stocked bar with a selection of delicious drinks
  • Two bartenders ready to serve your office

How to enter:

Simply fill in your details for the chance to win a visit from the Deliveroo bar in February. The more people who sign up, the more chance your company has to win. And even if you don't score the most votes, the runner-up will still win a hamper from Jeroboams worth £300.

Here's what happened when we took our bar-on-wheels to The LAD Bible's office in East London. Watch to see what you could win.

Deliveroo delivers drinks

We deliver from selected alcohol partners including Heineken, BrewDog, Majestic Wines and Moët. Just pop your postcode into the homepage or open the app to get great drinks delivered to you.

In the mood for a beer or glass of wine? Maybe even a pre-mixed cocktail? No need to leave the house – get drinks delivered straight to your door or office now. And don't forget that if you are ordering alcohol, we may ask for ID on delivery. Always remember to drink responsibly. Visit drinkaware.co.uk for more information.
